Yiyang being bribe at innorruk
-----Original Message-----
From: Sereph <garford@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 4:51 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Must read!!!-another server-DOH !


If people start shifting to the race war server and then turn back to Innoruuk, I'll be doing......
4) Stop playing EQ and systematically plan the murder of the people who can't decided WTH to do.

The reason I still stay on this list is because of the hope that we'll some how band together and advanture around doing quest, role playing etc...... Leveling up is plain boring at high levels without friends to joke around with. Heck, I even try to bribe people to group up with me.......

Alex wrote:

Ah, Cheng , come to Innorruk. Im here, some of us are always here. Race server?? Oooh, nice BUT im still on innoorruk, Good to take a look see how race server is like..but INNORRUK still the BASE. If some of u guys r not sure where u r goin to be, here's my suggestion.1) have a base char here in Innorruuk. Go play at Race server .u still have a fix char in Innorruk.2) Go to other servers and moonlight in all the servers and still be at a lvl 6th 12months from now :P3) Quit Playing EQ and get a life Regarding resources... I hope we dont have a mis-understanding here..on what im about to say.We (the ppl on Innorruuk) would be most happy to share our resouces(money, items, time,life etx) with the not so "regular" players in Innorruuk but I dont think im going to share a 100pp item and not see it being used. It doesnt make sense. You still have my friendship, that is free and without condition :) I love to play with u guys. I give a Singapore Guild my prority. SOme of U knows that im in a Guild already. I recommend any player approaching 20th lvl to be on a guild for "networking", resoucring and the utimate gaming experiences. Lvling is NOT the game or just a goal. Enjoy the journey and take in the adventure. Xp comes along with it. Stick to 1-2 chars for heavens Sake ! wait till u reach lvl 30 or so to have muti char. Yiyang'ing Loudy at Innorruuk
-----Original Message-----
From: Sereph <garford@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 2:22 PM
Subject: [sg-everquest] Must read!!!
This is an atempt to make us a tad more organise
We will from now onwards, be 100% base on Innoruuk. Anyone who disagree, give me your address and I'll force you to agree with a parang.

This is the short list of characters we have, please fill it up.

Name Character Class Race Level Location
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Sereph Sereph Bard Half Elf 3 Greater Faydark
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
LKW Ziltus Wizard High Elf 12 Freeport
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Alex Yiyang Monk Human 17 Freeport
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Entreri Radeon Monk Human 4 Freeport

Groups will be form base on levels. Each member in the group should not have a level difference of more than 3/4 from each other. This is to make grouping worth doing for the high level guys, and the lower level ones.

If possible, please summit a character report every friday night indicating your current level/where you are/what items you've found etc.........

So far, here are the groups:

Group 1, Level 15-19 -> Alex(Tank)
Group 2, Level 10-14 -> LKW(Magic support)
Group 3, Level 5-9 -> ???
The rest who are still very low level-> Enteri(Tank), Sereph(Secondary Support)

Anyone who change server, or propose a change of server without a valid reason will be forced to treat everyone on the list to lunch, for a week, so, don't anyhow change servers.
